author: Bernardino, de' Busti, approximately 1450-1513?
title: Defensorium Montis pietatis longe validissimum, a Fratre Bernardino de Busti,... - A la fin : Preclarum hoc Montis pietatis defensorium... curavit imprimendum probus vir Joannes Clein, chalcographus et bibliopola Lugdunensis, anno post Christum natum MC
